author: Loungecove.com
install_msg: Thanks for installing the VoteTracker cog! Use [p]help VoteTracker to see all commands.
name: VoteTracker
short: Track votes and manage giveaways with vote-based weighting
description: Track server votes, reward users with points, and run weighted giveaways based on voting activity
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord IDs and vote counts for users who participate in voting and giveaways.
